edition.title: The forme of prayers and ministration of the Sacraments, etc.
1564 Psalm Buik

availability.license: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 License

sourceDesc.p: Tunes and texts come from the Scottish Psalter 1564, harmonizations come from the Wode Partbooks

metDecl.p: All metre designations are only counts of syllables and do not refer to any type of poetic foot.
